snippet: Lawmakers are accusing the C.I.A. of misleading the makers of the movie “Zero Dark Thirty” by telling them that waterboarding and similar techniques helped track down Osama bin Laden.
abstract: Lawmakers are accusing Central Intelligence Agency of misleading makers of movie Zero Dark Thirty, about the raid on Osama bin Laden, by telling them that waterboarding and similar techniques helped track him down.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers are accusing the C.I.A. of misleading the makers of the movie “Zero Dark Thirty” by telling them that waterboarding and similar techniques helped track down Osama bin Laden.
